document_data.name: ''Girdle of Holy Might''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Girdles of holy might''''' were enchanted [[belt]]s that were used by [[cleric]]s to enhance their spell-casting abilities.
document_data.Powers: These belts more enchantments that improved clerics' spell-casting by granting them addition spells of mediocre to high power.
document_data.History: The [[Sword Coast Legion]] was a military cleric organization that was outfitted by the ''girdles of holy might'' to aid in their fight against ravaging [[orc]] gangs in the {{Yearlink|1323}}, the Year of the Black Horde.
